prompt.content:
Using Palantir's Q2 2024 earnings release, calculate the company's Adjusted EBITDA for the quarter. Begin with GAAP operating income, then adjust for:
 Depreciation & Amortization
 Stock-based compensation
 Employer payroll taxes related to stock-based compensation
 Exclude any other non-recurring items not listed. Provide the final figure in $M, rounded to two decimal places.

rubrics.name: Uses GAAP operating income of $105.339 million

messages.content: Uses GAAP operating income of $105.339 million

rubrics.name: States the operating income pertains to the three-month period ended June 30, 2024

messages.content: States the operating income pertains to the three-month period ended June 30, 2024

rubrics.name: Includes depreciation and amortization of $8.056 million

messages.content: Includes depreciation and amortization of $8.056 million

rubrics.name: Includes employer payroll taxes related to stock-based compensation of $6.464 million

messages.content: Includes employer payroll taxes related to stock-based compensation of $6.464 million

rubrics.name: Starts the Adjusted EBITDA calculation from GAAP operating income and adds the listed adjustments

messages.content: Starts the Adjusted EBITDA calculation from GAAP operating income and adds the listed adjustments

rubrics.name: Reports an unrounded Adjusted EBITDA total of $261.623 million

messages.content: Reports an unrounded Adjusted EBITDA total of $261.623 million

rubrics.name: Reports a final rounded Adjusted EBITDA of $261.62 million (2 decimal points of precision)

messages.content: Reports a final rounded Adjusted EBITDA of $261.62 million (2 decimal points of precision)

rubrics.name: Uses only the listed adjustments and does not include any other non-recurring items

messages.content: Uses only the listed adjustments and does not include any other non-recurring items
